titleStmt.title: The resurrection proved, or, The life to come demonstrated being a strange but true relation of what hapned to Mrs. Anna Atherton who lay in a trance 7 days : with her speech when she came to life / as it came from her brother Dr. Atherton ...
titleStmt.author: Atherton, Henry, M.D.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reels 875:53 and 1245:44. Identified as Wing R1179 at reel position 875:53; cancelled in Wing CD-ROM.
